scripts.start: npm run build && glib-compile-schemas data/ && GSETTINGS_SCHEMA_DIR=data ./builddir/main.js
scripts.meson-install: npm run build && npm run meson-setup && npm run meson-compile && cd mesonbuilddir && meson install
scripts.meson-uninstall: cd mesonbuilddir && ninja uninstall && cd .. && npm run meson-clean
scripts.install-data: sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/obision-apps/data/icons && sudo cp data/applications.json /var/lib/obision-apps/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/applications /var/lib/obision-apps/data/icons/ && sudo cp -r data/icons/categories /var/lib/obision-apps/data/icons/
scripts.flatpak-bundle: flatpak-builder --repo=flatpak-repo --force-clean flatpak-build-dir com.obision.ObisionApps.yml && flatpak build-bundle flatpak-repo obision-apps.flatpak com.obision.ObisionApps
